thread.title: CMU student suspect used gun registered to father: police

title: CMU student suspect used gun registered to father: police
text:
CMU student suspect used gun registered to father: police 1:25am IST - 01:32 
Central Michigan University police department said the gun that was used by the suspect to kill his parents was registered to his father, who was a police officer for a Chicago suburb. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Central Michigan University police department said the gun that was used by the suspect to kill his parents was registered to his father, who was a police officer for a Chicago suburb.
